Frequently Asked

How do I register for the conference?

Visit our registration page and select your preferred tier.

What is the registration deadline?

Registration deadlines vary by tier. Early bird offers limited availability.

Are there accommodation arrangements?

We provide guidance on nearby hotels and accommodation options.

What should I bring to the conference?

Formal attire, laptop/tablet, notebooks, and identification documents.

Ready to Begin Your Diplomatic Journey?

Don't wait - secure your place in the most prestigious MUN conference in South East Asia. Our team is standing by to assist you.
